data.title: Why are so many epic fantasies set in a medieval setting?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 26): There are many books that one would argue are not in the medieval time period (even for somewhat loose definitions of 'medieval'). It is a little unclear if all of these count as "epic" or not, but if Harry Potter is epic by virtue of a series and settings, then many of these sh...
